data.message: I seem to have a problem seeing less from certain source pages... I select HIDE and then  "see less from" however I still end up seeing largely from the same sources? (PS- just because I want o see less from someone does not mean I do not want to see them at all... just more influence from others is what is needed... tired of seeing same over and over....)

replies.message: Hi Neil. You can adjust what you see in your News Feed by hiding stories you don't want to see, by following or unfollowing friends, by choosing to see fewer stories from certain friends and by using “See First”. Learn how at: http://bit.ly/2rVR8Cy. We've also found that many people have a better experience when they can tell us what they'd like to see. If there is something we can do to improve your News Feed experience, please let us know at: http://bit.ly/2t0pioq. -William

Facebook Thank you for reply -  yeah I was just wondering how may times you have to click "SEE LESS FROM" before that kicks in, as I hit it all the time on some guys/pages and their stuff keeps showing up :) .

I guess another option is to UNFOLLOW however I do NOT like doing that to my friends, I would rather just "see less from"   however that function does not seem be working for me...  I understand there are limitations and all kinds of variables and so it may take multiple clicks at some or something  ....

Thank you for the link and I am checking it out now!  :)
